name: nimbly/syndicate
description: Framework agnostic queue and pubsub library.

suggest.pda\/pheanstalk: To add support for Beanstalkd queue.
suggest.predis\/predis: To add support for Redis based queue and pub/sub functionality.
suggest.aws\/aws-sdk-php: To add support for AWS Simple Queue Service (SQS).
suggest.google\/cloud-pubsub: To add support for Google Cloud Pubsub.
